name: SIFO-MultiTurn
description: Multi-turn extension of SIFO assessing sustained compliance across conversational turns.

metrics.name: accuracy
metrics.definition: Fraction of conversations with fully compliant responses at every turn

test_method: Simulate conversations using provided scripts; run an LLM or rule-based judge across turns to flag failures.
notes: Include details on judge prompt and whether memory/stateful prompting was used.
